def_en: A circus is a group that consists of clowns, acrobats, and animals which travels around to different places and performs shows.

def_cn: 闹哄哄的人群;架势很大的活动
def_en: If you describe a group of people or an event as a circus, you disapprove of them because they attract a lot of attention but do not achieve anything useful.

def_cn: (有时用于街道名称)环形路，环形广场，环形交叉口
def_en: Circus is sometimes used as part of the name of a street which goes in a circle.
